name: boop the cat 2.0
description:
this game was made for 

Endless Jam 2022

The game takes a little bit of time to load :3

Ballcat is back in a new action-packed Adventure!

This game will keep you entertained for HOURS. and its 100% FREE!

But if you don't believe me here are some reviews from Happy players

"I used to be bald but thanks to Boop the cat 2.0 I have hair again!"- some guy

" Who needs sleep when you can play this game!" -a man that hasn't slept in a year

Side effects include but are not limited to

-Lack of sleep due to playing "boop the cat 2.0"

-Inability to look away from computer

-Happiness

-And death
